nodes.desc: [Movie Discover] Discover new movies based on RATINGs.
nodes.raw_desc: Discover movies by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres and certifications

nodes.desc: [Movie Latest] Retrieve information about the most recently created movie.
nodes.raw_desc: Get the most newly created movie.

nodes.desc: [Movie Image] Fetch images of a movie using its ID
nodes.raw_desc: Get the images that belong to a movie

nodes.desc: [Movie Keyword] Retrieve the keywords of a movie using its ID
nodes.raw_desc: Get the keywords that have been added to a movie

nodes.desc: [Movie Recommendation] Obtain a list of recommended movies related to a particular movie using its ID.

nodes.desc: [Movie Release Date] Retrieve the release date of a movie using its ID.
nodes.raw_desc: Get the release date along with the certification for a movie

nodes.desc: [Movie Review] Retrieve user reviews for a movie.
nodes.raw_desc: Get the user reviews for a movie

nodes.desc: [Movie Similar] Obtain a list of movies that are similar to a particular movie using its ID.
nodes.raw_desc: Get a list of similar movies

nodes.raw_desc: Get the movie credits for a person, the results contains various information such as popularity and release date.
